name: Nancy J. RAY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Lieutenant Matthew E. Hunt, Trooper Harding, Trooper John Ridge, and Trooper Les Freeling

parties: Nancy J. RAY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Lieutenant Matthew E. Hunt, Trooper Harding, Trooper John Ridge, and Trooper Les Freeling.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
CAPPY and NIGRO, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: F. Stephenson Matthes, York, for Nancy J. Ray.
John M. Abel, Norristown, for State Police.
casebody.head_matter:
676 A.2d 194
Nancy J. RAY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Lieutenant Matthew E. Hunt, Trooper Harding, Trooper John Ridge, and Trooper Les Freeling.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 25, 1996.
Decided May 14, 1996.
F. Stephenson Matthes, York, for Nancy J. Ray.
John M. Abel, Norristown, for State Police.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.
